channel.title: Authors on Susannah Chandhok
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Susannah Chandhok

item.description: I am a Ph.D. student in social psychology at the University of Michigan in Ann Arbor studying social behavior in the digital age. My primary advisor is Dr. Ethan Kross. I am excited to be examining the psychosocial forces influencing emotional expression and interpersonal communication on the Internet and on social media, with a focus on distinguishing these forces from those shaping in-person behavior.
